card_name: Velia Sol, Queen of the Flock
special_text:
As long as Velia Sol isn’t on the battlefield, she’s a 4/4 Angel creature in addition to her other types.
[+1]: Put a flying counter and a lifelink counter on up to one target creature. It becomes an Angel.
[0]: Until end of turn, Velia Sol becomes a 4/4 Angel creature with flying, lifelink, and indestructible.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever an Angel you control attacks, exile target nonland permanent defending player controls.”
